data.title: Why Bitcoin, Ethereum, and XRP are falling? | FXStreet
data.description: Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Ripple (XRP) are off to a bearish start in December, with over 4% losses by press time on Monday. Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Ripple face renewed selling, risking further losses to $80,000 BTC, $2,100 ETH, and $1.90 XRP, respectively.
